capsules_submitted.utterance: You know, I've always been fascinated by Harry's story. He's truly the boy who lived, and it's incredible to think about what he went through at Hogwarts. I mean, can you imagine being famous in the wizarding world just because you're a target for Lord Voldemort? It's mind-boggling.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is harry's age?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Harry is 11 years old. I'm pretty sure about that, and it's a fact that's definitely true.

So Harry is 11 years old, huh? I think that's a pretty young age for someone to be in school already. I'm not sure if I would have been ready for that kind of responsibility at his age. (SENTIMENT: CONCERN)

capsules_submitted.utterance: I think McGonagall's glasses are really cool. I mean, who wouldn't want to wear a pair of magical square-lenses? They're definitely a unique accessory for any witch or wizard.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm so glad to see Professor McGonagall around here. She's an amazing educator and a true leader at Hogwarts. I've always had a lot of respect for her dedication to the school and its students.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm a huge fan of the Hogwarts houses, and I've always been particularly drawn to Gryffindor. The values of bravery, daring, and chivalry really resonate with me. Wood is definitely one of my favorite materials - it's so versatile and can be used for everything from furniture-making to wand-crafting!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to be in touch with his own personality. He's got a certain... let's say, authenticity about him that's hard to fake. I think that's part of what makes him relatable to people.
